location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from J J Cross, Supra Cargo of the Duncan, at Bushire to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the Resident's instructions that the speedy conveyance of the packet of intelligence from Europe is of utmost importance, and that the Duncanshould shorten its stay at the ports of Bushire and Muscat. It is noted that these instructions will be complied with in the hope that the owners of the Duncanwill be suitably compensated by the Bombay Government.
